channel.title: can't crouch jump
channel.description: I've tried to crouch jump, but he doesn't jump higher. And I even tried this:[url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=492518#post492518']https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=492518#post492518[/url], but he just jumps up, and crouches. Does anyone know what is wrong? Thx beforehand. :slight_smile:

item.title: can't crouch jump
item.dc:creator: groundwalker
item.description:
I’ve tried to crouch jump, but he doesn’t jump higher.
And I even tried this:https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=492518#post492518, but he just jumps up, and crouches.
Does anyone know what is wrong? Thx beforehand.
